Introduction
------------

Dubizzle (http://www.dubizzle.com/) is an online classifieds website. This project aims to 
become a simple and complete scraping-based API for Dubizzle.

Prerequisites
-------------

* Requests (http://docs.python-requests.org/en/latest/index.html)
* BeautifulSoup (http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/)
* Python 2.6+ (for `multiprocessing`)

Usage
-----

A quick tutorial and a few examples can be found on Github (https://github.com/Cyph0n/dubizzle/).

Issues
------

Please use the Issues tracker on Github (https://github.com/Cyph0n/dubizzle/issues).
